name: Elf On The Shelf - 2014
body:
To My Favorite Kids in Dundas,

2014 has been another fun and exciting year. I am happy to say that I have been reporting only the best of behavior to Santa. Yes, there have been a few days that weren't so great, but overall the three of you have earned all of the presents I noticed your mom and dad placed under the tree. 

Have a very merry Christmas.

I will see you again in 2015.

Sincerely,

The Elf on _**your**_ Shelf.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
